description:
Saionji Youko is the single mother of http://anidb.net/ch2346 [Saionji Sekai]. She`s a gentle, well-balanced person who often counsels her daughter in love matters (despite occasionally behaving like a teenager herself, thus causing embarrassment for Sekai).
Youko runs the family restaurant "Radish", well-known for their waitresses` cute uniforms; the restaurant staff includes Sekai as well as http://anidb.net/ch2347 [Setsuna]`s mother Mai (who`s doesn`t appear in the anime).
name: Saionji Youko
